notes: All requirements complete. SC-003: NewVertexAIClient now accepts fallbackRegion parameter. SC-004: GetRegion no longer reads from environment, accepts fallbackRegion parameter instead. SC-005: defaultRegion constant moved to main.go (removed from vertexai.go). SC-006: getPort() function removed, main() now uses config.Port directly. All os.Getenv calls are now centralized in loadConfig() in main.go.
